lines.text: Since the passing of the Oriental Exclusion Act the smuggling of aliens has been constant. Although the smuggling is less than a few years ago, when Chinese were brought into the United States from Mexico in carlots, the traffic has by no means ceased, according to immigration officials. The length of the frontier and sparsely settled regions makes patrolling impossible. These smugglers have no regard for human life and resort to any means to accomplish their selfish ends. The boss of the ring, at this time, is receiving fifteen hundred dollars per head on safe delivery.
[Bob snaps the handcuffs his wrist to Viola's]
Hey! What am I going to tell Graves about this?
Tell him I eloped with the secret agent that helped me crack this case.
And don't forget to turn in your resignation!
